data.event: Concession contract # 2-85 refers to "Xan field" (47 drilled wells), whose exploration started in the mid 1950s.

This contract was initially subscribed with the Basic Resources company, founded in the 1960s by John D. Park, one of the lawyers that worked in the Guatemalan Oil Code after the counter-revolution in 1954.

event.title: worked in the Guatemalan Oil Code after the counter-revolution in 1954

data.event: This contract was initially subscribed with the Basic Resources company, founded in the 1960s by John D. Park, one of the lawyers that worked in the Guatemalan Oil Code after the counter-revolution in 1954.
Basic Resources started exploring possible oil wells during the 1970s and began the commercial production in the 1980s, in the middle of the Guatemala Civil War.
Basic Resources started exploring possible oil wells during the 1970s and began the commercial production in the 1980s, in the middle of the Guatemala Civil War.
During the 1970s, Basic Resources joins "Operaci√≥n Conjunta", which is a combined effort led by the French public company Elf Aquitaine.
In 1985, Basic Resources had signed contract 2-85 with the Guatemalan government for 25 years.

event.title: mid 1990s, the new environmental laws and civilian groups start

data.event: However, in the mid 1990s, the new environmental laws and civilian groups start complaining that there is negative impacts from the oil activity in Laguna del Tigre.
